New Records: David Miller scored 59 off 46 balls and Aiden Markram scored 52 off 41 balls
Lungi Ngidi took a four-wicket haul
Key Match Events: South Africa completed the chase with two balls to spare
Tension filled the last over as South Africa needed six runs off six balls
David Miller hit a crucial 59 off 46 to lead South Africa's chase
Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma expected the pitch to have assistance for seamers and mentioned conditions are not an excuse
The match was a high-stakes encounter with significant implications for India's net run rate
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma mentioned India's missed opportunities and poor fielding
Lungi Ngidi expressed the excitement of winning a World Cup match
David Miller and Aiden Markram were praised for their partnership
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match saw a thrilling finish with key moments in the last over
South Africa moved to the top of Group 1 after the win
